## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                         | Type       | Default                     |
| -------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------------- | ---------- | --------------------------- |
| `category`     | `category`      | The category badge text             | `string`   | `'Supplement'`              |
| `images`       | --              | Array of product image URLs         | `string[]` | `[]`                        |
| `isSale`       | `is-sale`       | Indicates if the product is on sale | `boolean`  | `false`                     |
| `price`        | `price`         | The price display                   | `string`   | `'$0.00'`                   |
| `productTitle` | `product-title` | The product title                   | `string`   | `'Premium Peach Nutrition'` |
